lines.text: I was brought up here, you know. Now, I'm kind of glad I ran away from home when I was 11. I guess there's gonna be some kind of investigation.
Why don't you just burn the place?
I don't know. That's what I'd do. It's an evil motel.
Meat's meat, and a man's gotta eat.
[Vincent uses human flesh to spice up his meat]
It takes all kinds of critters to make Farmer Vincent's fritters.
There's too many people in the world and not enough food. Now this takes care of both problems at the same time.
Sometimes I wonder about the karmic implications of these actions.
I'm the biggest hypocrite of them all. My meats... I used preservatives.
